LanguageData.AM_DecomposingWeapons.label: 拆解枪械
LanguageData.AM_DecomposingWeapons.description: 将枪械拆卸成武器零件
LanguageData.AM_DecomposingWeaponsI.label: 拆解精密枪械
LanguageData.AM_DecomposingWeaponsI.description: 将精密枪械拆卸成多个武器零件
LanguageData.AM_DisassembleHeavyArmor.label: 拆解重型装甲
LanguageData.AM_DisassembleHeavyArmor.description: 把重型装甲拆解为防弹装甲板与纤维布料
LanguageData.AM_DisassembleLightArmor.label: 拆解轻质装甲
LanguageData.AM_DisassembleLightArmor.description: 把轻质装甲拆解为防弹装甲板与纤维布料
LanguageData.AM_DisassemblePolyethylenePlate.label: 拆解聚乙烯防弹插板
LanguageData.AM_DisassemblePolyethylenePlate.descript: 把聚乙烯装甲板上的芳纶布料层拆下来，以回收珍贵的芳纶
LanguageData.AM_DisassemblePolyethylenePlate.jobStrin: 正在拆解聚乙烯防弹插板
